Rinji

Introduction

Rinji is a South Korean dancer and singer under ALLART Entertainment.

On September 27, 2022, it was announced that PIXY would be adding a new member, Rinji, to the group. She made her first promotion as part of the group with the start of their 1st European tour "Wanna Be Your Villian" on October 13, 2022.
